articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 2 killed and 32 injured after a bridge collapses at a tourist destination in western India - NBC News
articles.description: NEW DELHI — At least two people died and 32 others were injured after an iron bridge over a river collapsed on Sunday at a popular tourist destination in India’s western Maharashtra state, the state’s top elected official said

articles.title: Air India plane crash death toll rises to 270 - BBC
articles.description: Dr Dhaval Gameti said 270 bodies have been recovered from the site of Thursday's plane crash in Ahmedabad.
articles.content:
Doctors in India say 270 bodies have been recovered from the site of Thursday's plane crash in Ahmedabad.
